text: Surjoux is a former commune. It is found in the region Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes in the Ain department in the east of France. On 1 January 2019, it was merged into the new commune of Surjoux-Lhopital.Arrêté préfectoral , 3 December 2018 == References == Category:Former communes in Ain
title: Surjoux
